Posts.Content:
Eviledna - thank you for your reply. I am in Florida. I hope that your biopsy results are ok and I wish you the best. It is interesting that you mentioned fibromyalgia. I had that come up in a couple of searches and wondered if that might be what I had, although it has never been something I thought about
 before. 
I can only hope that my doctor responds quickly and thoroughly.
Posts.Title: 10 months of left breast pain, now spreading to back and worsening

Posts.Content:
Hi all.  I am new to this forum, and I am hoping someone's experiences are similar enough to provide some ideas of how to move forward. A little background - this is not my first bout of issues with my left breast.  I had benign cysts removed about
 5 years ago from that side.
Posts.Title: 10 months of left breast pain, now spreading to back and worsening
